item.title: Tinkering
item.description: I’ve been contemplating leaving WordPress for a while.

item.title: Meta: What’s up with all the Reading?
item.description: So far this year, I’ve published seven posts with the tag “reading “.

item.title: “All Things in Moderation”
item.description: Just a house-keeping note, Akismet seems to be missing lots of single-word comment link spam (ironically many of the comments have “sorry” as the body text; yeah, right).

item.title: Im-Pressed
item.description: I recently blogged about developing a CherryPy application to drive the non-blog portion of yergler.

item.title: New Hosting, Again
item.description: Well if you can see this post, the DNS changes have propogated, and yergler.

item.title: WordPress-ed
item.description: As I mentioned earlier , the proliferation of spam comments and the flap over Movable Type’s new licensing scheme motivated me to search out other blogging software.

item.title: Comments, Spam and Dollars
item.description: So I’ve been busy with work and yard work lately, so not much time to blog.

item.title: Publishing with PyBlosxom
item.description: I’ve now managed to convert the majority of yergler.

item.title: The Law of Averages 2.0
item.description: After doing the design for the mozCC website , I decided that The Law of Averages needed an overhaul, too.

item.title: pixels.yergler.net
item.description: In December, 2001 I bought my first digital camera, a Canon Digital Elph.

item.title: New Hosting
item.description: So if you’re seeing this blog post, the DNS records have sufficiently propogated, and you’re viewing yergler.
So this is my fourth (and hopefully final) attempt at a blog.
